ILBVec3 Struct Reference

This reference page is linked to from the following overview topics: Creating Point Clouds.

Search for all occurrences

#include <beastapitypes.h>

Class Description

Three dimensional geometric vector type.


Used for both points and vectors, what is what should be obvious from the context.

Examples:

examples-physical/code/common/vecmath.h, examples/code/common/primitives.h, examples/code/common/vecmath.h, include/beastapi/beastapitypes.h, include/beastapi/beastmesh.h, include/beastapi/beastpointcloud.h, include/beastapi/beastrenderpass.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastmeshwrapper.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastrenderpasswrapper.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/mayautils.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/rnmpass.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastmeshwrapper.cpp, maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastrenderpasswrapper.cpp, maya/beastmayaplugin/src/mayautils.cpp, maya/beastmayaplugin/src/rendermanager.cpp, and maya/beastmayaplugin/src/rnmpass.cpp.
